thread.title: Kohl’s Cardholders: NuWave 3-Quart Digital Air Fryer Only $62.99 + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash

author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: NuWave 3-Quart Digital Air Fryer Only $62.99 + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash
text:
Hop on over to Kohl’s.com where they are offering up this NuWave Digital Air Fryer for only $99.99 (regularly $119.99). Plus, they are also currently offering an instant savings of 10% – automatically deducted at checkout.
Even sweeter, Kohl’s cardholders can use the promo codes MARCH30 for 30% off your purchase and FREE4MAR to score free shipping on ANY size order. And, through March 12th, you’ll get $10 in Kohl’s Cash for every $50 you spend. You can then use your earned Kohl’s Cash coupon from March 13th-26th. Check out the deal you can score…
Kohl’s Cardholder Deal Idea: Buy NuWave 3-qt. Digital Air Fryer $99.99 (reg. $119.99) 
Minus 10% Instant Savings discount at checkout -will deduct $10 
Use promo code MARCH30 (30% off)
Use promo code FREE4MAR (free shipping)
Final Cost $62.99 shipped + earn $10 Kohl’s Cash!
Not a Kohl’s cardholder? Save an extra 15% off a $100+ purchase with code CATCH15OFF at checkout (expires 12/31/17). Shipping is free on any order of $75 or starts at $8.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pick up if available near you.
(Thanks, Jessie!)
